Carpool with people near you

Save money, gas, and make new friends!
We won't even get into greenhouse gas emissions, climate change,
depletion of natural resources, and all that other stuff...

Next

Headed to that big event downtown?

We bet some of your neighbors are, too!

Next

So you could:

each drive a separate car with a few empty seats
compete with each other for parking spots
pay $25 to park
wait three hours to get into and out of the parking lot
waste money on gas
never venture outside of your social circle

OR...

Next

...You could use Carpool App to connect with people near you that are going, too.

Hop in their car or offer up your empty seats and:
split parking costs
minimize the number of cars on the road
befriend your neighbors!

Did we mention it's good for the planet?

  • Get the App
Next

How It Works

Carpooling has never been easier!

Create or Find an Event

Add your event to encourage carpooling or search for local events that you want to carpool to.

Review Potential Rideshares

Use the app to see who is attending and how far they live from you.

Connect with People

Chat with people you might ride with to see if it will be a good fit!

Fill Up a Car

Approve the people you'll be driving or get approved to ride in someone else's car.

Earn Points for Each Ride

Redeem your points for gas discounts and other prizes!

Have a blast!

Carpool to your event, make friends, save money, save gas, save the planet!

  • Get the App

Psst...Event Creators!

Let us know if you want to learn more about how to publicize carpooling to your event, how to measure the environmental benefits, and more!
